definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Seems Charlie's in hot water…And she's about to get burned.
sentences.chinese: 查莉貌似陷入水深火热，马上要引火上身了。

sentences.english: It really is the simplest way, to keep from getting burned.
sentences.chinese: 这的确是简单的办法，来防止引火上身。

sentences.english: China bares top, with a panties and a skirt.
sentences.chinese: 中国光着上身，下边一条裙子一条内裤。

sentences.english: It really is the simplest way to keep from getting burned.
sentences.chinese: 这是避免引火上身最简单的方法。

sentences.english: In fact, the less your body moves the better a dancer you are.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，你上身动得越少，则表明你的舞技越高。

sentences.english: Your shoulders would remain behind your knees while you bend the knees to lift.
sentences.chinese: 您需维持上身的姿势与站立时一样，只是结束时弯膝。

sentences.english: It really the simplest way to keep from getting burned.
sentences.chinese: 这的确是简单的办法，来防止引火上身。

sentences.english: Then straightening upper body up, setting heel plane, lifting leg point.
sentences.chinese: 然后直起上身，放平脚跟，抬起腿尖。
买下来，享受上身的喜悦吧。

sentences.english: I have to go with the more common topless enemy within the level, The Temptress.
sentences.chinese: 我得去与敌人更常见的裸露上身的水平之内。

sentences.english: You can see topless women on beaches.
sentences.chinese: 在海滩上你能看到赤裸着上身的女人。

sentences.english: Bodice is tight and form-fitting, waist skirt is loose, forming a cone-shaped modeling.
sentences.chinese: 女装上身紧身合体，下身宽松，形成一种圆锥状造型。

sentences.english: He half-turned and then pulled his chair right round.
sentences.chinese: 他先转动上身，然后把椅子转过来。

sentences.english: When he was a cop, he used a bullet-proof vest to cover his chest.
sentences.chinese: 当警察时，他上身要穿着防弹背心保护胸部。

sentences.english: The second day , training , reason why still being the upper part of the body suffer unspeakably.
sentences.chinese: 第二日，仍然是上身的训练，所以苦不堪言。

sentences.english: She had been stabbed and had severe injuries from blunt-force trauma to the head and upper body.
sentences.chinese: 她被用刀刺伤，头部和上身有多处钝器所致的外伤。

definition: lower half of one's body/Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)
